TSHR

TECH SOLUTIONS FOR HUMAN RIGHTS

An interdisciplinary team that aims to reimagine the delivery of complex qualitative information.

Services

Transforming qualitative data into clear, actionable insights. We make complex information accessible and understandable, empowering informed decisions and driving meaningful change.

TSHR custom-builds and fine-tunes each tool to fit specific needs, going beyond off-the-shelf models to deliver precise, tailored solutions—while maintaining privacy and, in legal matters, confidentiality.

  • Effective, Equitable and Practical Machine Learning Tools
  • Human Rights and Environmental Research
  • Human-Centered Design
  • Substantive Accessibility of Human Rights
  • Open Source

TSHR

Why choose our web agency?

Founded by Viraaj Akuthota, TSHR is dedicated to making complex data clear and actionable. Click here for Viraaj Akuthota's background.

Expertise
Our team consists of highly skilled diverse professionals with extensive experience in machine learning, research, database design, UI/UX, economics, and web development.
Future-Ready and Efficient Technology
Built on the latest academic research, our tools are innovative and reliable. Citing these sources shows their solid foundations, building trust in a world of misleading innovation.
Inclusive, User-Centric Design
Built with accessibility and usability at the core, these tools make complex qualitative data understandable for users from all backgrounds, ranging from professional users to underserved communities.
Streamlined Insights from Qualitative Data
Complex data is transformed into clear, actionable insights, empowering both specialists and non-experts to make informed, data-driven decisions and apply insights directly to their unique challenges.
Open-Source and Adaptable Solutions
With open-source, customizable tools, organizations can implement secure, flexible solutions tailored to specific needs, supporting internal hosting and alignment with evolving goals.
Custom, Efficient Models for Greater Accuracy
Purpose-built models provide high accuracy with low computational demands, delivering advanced insights even on limited infrastructure and maximizing resource efficiency.
